item.title: Adaptable Logical Control for Large Language Models
item.description: Ctrl-G: A neuro-symbolic framework enables adaptable control of LLM generation by combining any LLM with a Hidden Markov Model (HMM), ensuring outputs adhere to logical constraints specified as determ…
